bibl.title: State and Aristocracy in the Economic Evolution of the Late Empire.
Production and Public Powers in Antiquity. Eleventh International Economic History Congress, Milan, September 1994. Proceedings
bibl.author: BANAJI, Jairus

bibl.note: The economic revival of the late antique period was closely bound up with its monetary history. The new eastern aristocracy owed its existence to the state and was bound to it by a strong sense of patrimonial loyalty.
BANAJI Jairus, State and Aristocracy in the Economic Evolution of the Late Empire.
Production and Public Powers in Antiquity. Eleventh International Economic History Congress, Milan, September 1994. Proceedings (Milano, 1994) pp. 107-117.
